Description: The year the player was drafted
The name of the player
The team that the player was drafted by in 2021
The team or league that the player was affiliated with prior to the 2021 draft
The team(s) that the player played for during the 2021-2022 season
The round during which the player was drafted (1 or 2)
The number that the player was picked within the first or second round of the draft (1 to 30)
The number that the player was picked during the overall draft in 2021 (1 to 60)
Ranking of the player during the 2021-2022 season
Position of the player on the team (Shooting Guard, Point Guard, Center, Small Forward, Power Forward)
Player's age on February 1 of the season (years)
Games played during the 2021-2022 season
Games started during the 2021-2022 season
Minutes played per game during the 2021-2022 season (minutes)
Field goals made (includes 2 and 3 pointers)
Field goal attempts per game (includes 2 and 3 pointers)
Percentage of field goals made out of attempted field goals (includes 2 and 3 pointers)
3-Point field goals made per game
3-Point field goal attempts per game
Percentage of 3-point field goals made out of attempted 3-point field goals
2-point field goals made per game
2-point field goal attempts per game
Percentage of 2-point field goals made out of attempted 2-point field goals per game
Percentage of field goals made out of attempted field goals, adjusted for the fact that a 3-point field goal is worth one more point than a 2-point field goal; formula: ((FGM + (0.5 * 3PM)) / FGA
Free throws made per game
Free throw attempts per game
Percentage of free throws made out of attempted free throws per game
The number of rebounds a player or team has collected per game while they were on offense; A rebound occurs when a player recovers the ball after a missed shot.
The number of rebounds a player or team has collected per game while they were on defense; A rebound occurs when a player recovers the ball after a missed shot.
The number of rebounds a player or team has collected per game; a rebound occurs when a player recovers the ball after a missed shot.
Number of passes that lead directly to a made basket per game
Number of times a defensive player or team takes the ball from a player on offense, causing a turnover, per game
Blocks per game; A block occurs when an offensive player attempts a shot, and the defense player tips the ball, blocking their chance to score
Turnovers per game; A turnover occurs when the player or team on offense loses the ball to the defense
The number of personal fouls the player committed per game
The number of points the player scored per game (points)
